(127x1+0)/1 mod 32768 = 127. (127x3+1)/2 mod 16384 = 191. (127x9+5)/4 mod 8192 = 287. (127x27+19)/8 mod 4096 = 431. (127x81+65)/16 mod 2048 = 647. (127x243+211)/32 mod 1024 = 971. (127x729+665)/64 mod 512 = 433. (127x2187+2059)/128 mod 256 = 138. (127x2187+2059)/256 mod 128 = 69. (127x6561+6433)/512 mod 64 = 40. (127x6561+6433)/1024 mod 32 = 20. (127x6561+6433)/2048 mod 16 = 10. (127x6561+6433)/4096 mod 8 = 5. (127x19683+23395)/8192 mod 4 = 0. (127x19683+23395)/16384 mod 2 = 0. (127x19683+23395)/32768 mod 1 = 0.
